casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. LOWERY
v.
MEDINA CTY. BD. OF ELECTIONS. 2018-0437 Supreme Court of Ohio. April 3, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In Mandamus and Prohibition. On motion for leave to intervene as respondent of Heidi R. Carroll. Motion denied. Sua sponte, cause consolidated with No. 2018-0436, State ex rel. Emhoff. v. Medina Cty. Bd. of Elections.

O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell, Kennedy, French, Fischer, DeWine, and DeGenaro, JJ., concur.
